mapper.sql: a.guid as "guid", a.ygbh as "ygbh", a.gh as "gh", a.ssjg as "ssjg.guid", a.ssks as "ssks.guid", a.ssbq as "ssbq.guid", a.zc as "zc.guid", a.yglx as "yglx", a.xm as "xm", a.xb as "xb", a.sfzhm as "sfzhm", a.lxdh as "lxdh", a.cjr as "cjr.guid", a.zhxgr as "zhxgr.guid", a.cjsj as "cjsj", a.zhxgsj as "zhxgsj", a.scbzw as "scbzw"
